post.description: Delete a user, and all his subscriptions
Save or update a user. If the id is not specified, a new user will be created
Save collapsed or expanded status for a category

get.description: Get a list of category entries

parameters.name: readType
parameters.description: all entries or only unread ones

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: search for keywords in either the title or the content of the entries, separated by spaces, 3 characters minimum

parameters.name: excludedSubscriptionIds
parameters.description: comma-separated list of excluded subscription ids

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: keep only entries tagged with this tag

get.description: Get a feed of category entries

parameters.name: readType
parameters.description: all entries or only unread ones

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: search for keywords in either the title or the content of the entries, separated by spaces, 3 characters minimum

parameters.name: excludedSubscriptionIds
parameters.description: comma-separated list of excluded subscription ids

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: keep only entries tagged with this tag

get.description: Get all categories and subscriptions of the user

get.summary: Get unread count for feed subscriptions

post.description: Mark feed entries of this category as read

get.summary: Get list of tags for the user
get.description: Get list of tags for the user

post.description: Mark a feed entry as read/unread
Mark a feed entry as read/unread

get.description: Export an OPML file of the user's subscriptions

post.description: Fetch a feed by its url

get.description: Get a list of feed entries

parameters.name: readType
parameters.description: all entries or only unread ones

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: search for keywords in either the title or the content of the entries, separated by spaces, 3 characters minimum

get.summary: Get feed entries as a feed
get.description: Get a feed of feed entries

parameters.name: readType
parameters.description: all entries or only unread ones

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: search for keywords in either the title or the content of the entries, separated by spaces, 3 characters minimum

post.description: Import an OPML file, posted as a FORM with the 'file' name
Mark feed entries as read (unread is not supported)

get.summary: Queue all feeds of the user for refresh
get.description: Manually add all feeds of the user to the refresh queue

post.description: Manually add a feed to the refresh queue

password.description: user password, never returned by the api

name.description: name of the feed or the category requested

errorCount.description: times the server tried to refresh the feed and failed

feedLink.description: URL of the website, extracted from the feed, only filled if querying for feed entries, not category entries

hasMore.description: if the query has more elements

ignoredReadStatus.description: if true, the unread flag was ignored in the request, all entries are returned regardless of their read status

Entries.description: List of entries with some metadata

rtl.description: whether entry content and title are rtl

enclosureType.description: entry enclosure mime type, if any

mediaThumbnailUrl.description: entry media thumbnail url, if any

mediaThumbnailWidth.description: entry media thumbnail width, if any

mediaThumbnailHeight.description: entry media thumbnail height, if any

insertedDate.description: entry insertion date in the database

iconUrl.description: The favicon url to use for this feed

markable.description: whether the entry is still markable (old entry statuses are discarded)

expanded.description: whether the category is expanded or collapsed

position.description: position of the category in the list

message.description: error message while fetching the feed

lastRefresh.description: last time the feed was refreshed

nextRefresh.description: next time the feed refresh is planned, null if refresh is already queued

iconUrl.description: The favicon url to use for this feed

position.description: position of the subscription's in the list

filter.description: JEXL string evaluated on new entries to mark them as read if they do not match

olderThan.description: mark only entries older than this

insertedBefore.description: pass the timestamp you got from the entry list to avoid marking entries that may have been fetched in the mean time and never displayed

keywords.description: only mark read if a feed has these keywords in the title or rss content

excludedSubscriptions.description: if marking a category or 'all', exclude those subscriptions from the marking

items.description: if marking a category or 'all', exclude those subscriptions from the marking

name.description: new name, null if not changed

position.description: new display position, null if not changed

name.description: new name, null if not changed

position.description: new display position, null if not changed

filter.description: JEXL string evaluated on new entries to mark them as read if they do not match

title.description: name of the feed for the user

categoryId.description: id of the user category to place the feed in

language.description: user's preferred language, english if none

readingMode.description: user reads all entries or unread entries only

readingOrder.description: user reads entries in ascending or descending order

showRead.description: user wants category and feeds with no unread entries shown

scrollMarks.description: In expanded view, scroll through entries mark them as read

customCss.description: user's custom css for the website

customJs.description: user's custom js for the website

scrollSpeed.description: user's preferred scroll speed when navigating between entries

scrollMode.description: whether to scroll to the selected entry

starIconDisplayMode.description: whether to show the star icon in the header of entries

externalLinkIconDisplayMode.description: whether to show the external link icon in the header of entries

markAllAsReadConfirmation.description: ask for confirmation when marking all entries as read

customContextMenu.description: show commafeed's own context menu on right click

mobileFooter.description: on mobile, show action buttons at the bottom of the screen

currentPassword.description: current user password, required to change profile data

email.description: changes email of the user, if specified

newPassword.description: changes password of the user, if specified
